column4: Hey guys, I just upgraded to 8.10, and my system hangs on boot.  The only way I can get it to continue is hitting alt-ctrl-delete.  I cannot find anything that could be causing this.  Anyone know of where I can look to see what is hanging?  Thanks!
check the release notes for ibex... they might address your issue.
what does the release notes tell me if I have installed 8.10 and it is hanging with 8.10
it might tell you why it's hanging and what to do about it.
